backend/main.mo: Actor manages a map of words to translation lists with add, update, query, and delete operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two rollback-related features to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend Valentine feature files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying Valentine flow correctness, animations, responsiveness, and post-deployment behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App component that renders the ValentineProposalFlow.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Confetti: Spawns and cleans up 100 falling confetti elements on mount.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Floating: Continuously spawns floating heart emojis that rise and self-remove.
frontend/src/features/valentine/FlowerSh: Creates 50 falling flower emoji elements with randomized animation timing.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/me: Empty placeholder file for memory image storage utilities.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Empty placeholder file for the memories image hook.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/At: Intro step displaying attention message and button to proceed.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Fi: Final step presenting YES/NO question and triggering confetti/flowers or playful message.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/He: Greeting step explaining effort behind the website with a continue button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Le: Letter-style step with sentimental text and a button to proceed.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Me: Displays three static memory images with captions and a continue button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Centered layout wrapper applying fade-in animation to step content.
Controls the 5-step Valentine flow and renders the correct step with background hearts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, identity loading, and login status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables plus animations for hearts, confetti, flowers, and fade-in effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors tied to CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s build state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine proposal website.
